XenotypeDef.label: galactic human
XenotypeDef.description: Humans adapted to life across thousands of star systems. They are versatile and resilient, having evolved subtle enhancements for space travel and diverse planetary conditions.

XenotypeDef.label: twi'lek
XenotypeDef.description: Graceful humanoids with distinctive head-tails called lekku. Twi'leks are naturally charismatic and possess enhanced social abilities, making them excellent diplomats and performers.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Graceful aliens with natural social talents

XenotypeDef.label: wookiee
XenotypeDef.description: Tall, furry humanoids known for their incredible strength and loyalty. Wookiees are natural mechanics and fierce warriors with lifespans measured in centuries.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Strong, loyal beings with mechanical aptitude

XenotypeDef.label: nord
XenotypeDef.description: Hardy humans from frozen northern lands. Nords possess natural resistance to cold and are born warriors with strong constitutions and fierce temperaments.

XenotypeDef.label: altmer
XenotypeDef.description: High elves with superior magical abilities and extended lifespans. They consider themselves the most civilized and refined race, often displaying arrogance alongside their considerable talents.

XenotypeDef.label: orsimer
XenotypeDef.description: Orcs are the strongest and most physically powerful of the elven races. They live by a strict code of honor and strength, excelling in combat and craftsmanship.
XenotypeDef.descriptionShort: Strong orcish elves with warrior culture

XenotypeDef.label: khajiit
XenotypeDef.description: Feline humanoids with enhanced senses and natural agility. Khajiit are skilled traders, thieves, and scouts, with a culture that values cleverness and adaptability.

XenotypeDef.label: argonian
XenotypeDef.description: Reptilian humanoids adapted to swamp environments. Argonians possess natural resistance to disease and poison, with the ability to breathe underwater for extended periods.
